description: T.001 Chestnut - Carry out an aerial inspection of cavity on secondary leader and monitor.T.004 Chestnut - Carry out aerial inspection of two cavities at 6m and monitor.T.005 Lime - 6m Reduction in height of Western Leader, 2m Reduction in height of Eastern Leader, to suitable growth points.T.007 Liquid Amber - Crown lift to 3m from ground level.T.17 Bay - Crownlift to 3m from ground level.T.24 Ash - Fell.T.29 Sugar Maple - Crown lift to 3m from ground level.T.30 Aracia - Fell.T.052 Oak - Crown lift to 3m from ground level and continue monitoring.T.067 Ash - Fell (smaller tree, heavily surppressed with a significant lean).T.084 Sugar Maple - Crown lift to 5m from ground level.Additional unnumbered Ash on Eastern boundary in terminal decline - Fell.Hawthorn group (throughout site) - Crown lift to 3m (Exempt from application).Elm group (Self seeded young elm dying of DED throughout site boundary) - Fell (Exempt from application).Ash throughout site should be monitored for Ash Dieback symptoms going forward.
